**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 38 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33 [Scarlet Triad Agent](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1567) **Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 31 **Perception** +21 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +22, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +15, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +23, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +19, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +24, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +24 **Str** +2 **Dex** +7 **Con** +3 **Int** +0 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +6 **Items** _+1 [blowgun](/Weapons.aspx?ID=66)_ (20 darts), _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_, [Lethargy Poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=120) (4 doses), [Manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32), [Purple Worm Venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=126) (2 doses), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36)_, [ruby and sapphire ring](/Weapons.aspx?ID=37) --- **AC** 32 **Fort** +18 **Ref** +24 **Will** +21 **HP** 195 --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _rapier_+24 ([deadly 1d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 2d6+8 piercing **Ranged** _blowgun_ +24 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 7 piercing plus poison **Arcane Spells Known** DC 33 - **Cantrips (3rd)** [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132) - **1st** [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110) - **2nd** [Hideous Laughter](/Spells.aspx?ID=150) - **3rd** [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) **Efficient Capture** ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** Thea has [manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32) in hand and is adjacent to a creature. **Effect** Thea attempts to bind the creature's wrists or ankles with the manacles. If she succeeds at an attack roll with a +24 modifier against the target's AC, she applies the manacles. **Precise Debilitations** **Trigger** Thea's Strike hits a [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creature and deals damage. **Effect** Thea applies one of the following debilitations to the creature, which lasts until the end of her next turn.
  • _Brow Gash_ The target becomes [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16).
  • _Deep Cut_ The target takes an additional 2d6 precision damage from Thea's attacks.
  • _Hamstring_ The target takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.
  • _Low Blow_ The target becomes [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13).
**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** 3d6 **Weapon Trick** When Thea critically succeeds at an attack roll against a [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creature, she applies the [critical specialization effect](/Rules.aspx?ID=235) for the weapon she is wielding.
name: Scarlet Triad Agent
